name: Gazal Jain
position: Engineering @Adobe | Ex- SDE @Microsoft Research, @PayPal, @Nasdaq| Full Stack Development

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer (Contingent)
experience.description:
- Contributed to the developement of HyWay Project - a PoC initiative under MSR Labs, enabling seamless

interaction between in-person and remote participants in hybrid events. Led key functionalities like user

controls, the authoring tool, and real-time feedback integration via Microsoft’s Feedback SDK.

- Migrated the application’s authentication flow to MSAL (Microsoft Authentication Library) and Azure services

to Managed Identity by designing a robust middleware-based authentication layer, eliminating the security

risk of storing Azure service connection tokens locally in the application.

- Led application analytics implementation with Azure Application Insights, designing a robust logging

framework and batching mechanism for client-side logs, overcoming SDK limits for smooth data transmission
experience.description_html:
- Contributed to the developement of HyWay Project - a PoC initiative under MSR Labs, enabling seamless
interaction between in-person and remote participants in hybrid events. Led key functionalities like user
controls, the authoring tool, and real-time feedback integration via Microsoft’s Feedback SDK.
- Migrated the application’s authentication flow to MSAL (Microsoft Authentication Library) and Azure services
to Managed Identity by designing a robust middleware-based authentication layer, eliminating the security
risk of storing Azure service connection tokens locally in the application.
- Led application analytics implementation with Azure Application Insights, designing a robust logging
framework and batching mechanism for client-side logs, overcoming SDK limits for smooth data transmission

positions.subtitle: PayPal
positions.description: -Joined Mexico project, focused on Pricing component for transaction fee calculation in PayPal. Implemented caching logic for IC2B initiative, storing user's installment preference in cache for later retrieval during response to another API call. - Spearheaded transformative alterations within the realm of Compliance services revolutionizing the experience of eKYC for Sole Proprietorship business users in Japan. Designed new compliance rules as a part of PoC for implementing eKYC functionality. - Received Spot Award for excellent performance in the eKYC initiative. - Played a pivotal role in the Japan eKYB initiative by implementing strategic enhancements to the message daemon utilized in a key service component. Configured the message daemon code to publish the new request body from one service into other. - Consistently took charge of addressing real-time customer issues, showcasing a proactive com- mitment to seamless service. Addressed and resolved above 50+ live customer issues and gave support in migration of accounts from manual kyc to ekyc and vice-versa. - Designed meticulous Unit Tests and Functional Tests in eKYC and eKYB initiatives, elevating the overall application flow and ensuring exceptional code integrity. Added above 100+ test cases in both initiatives. - Tech Stack: Spring Boot, Mockito Framework.
positions.title: SDE -1
positions.description_html:
-Joined Mexico project, focused on Pricing component for transaction fee calculation in PayPal. Implemented caching logic for IC2B initiative, storing user's installment preference in cache for later retrieval during response to another API call.
- Spearheaded transformative alterations within the realm of Compliance services revolutionizing the experience of eKYC for Sole Proprietorship business users in Japan. Designed new compliance rules as a part of PoC for implementing eKYC functionality.
- Received Spot Award for excellent performance in the eKYC initiative.
- Played a pivotal role in the Japan eKYB initiative by implementing strategic enhancements to the message daemon utilized in a key service component. Configured the message daemon code
to publish the new request body from one service into other.
- Consistently took charge of addressing real-time customer issues, showcasing a proactive com-
mitment to seamless service. Addressed and resolved above 50+ live customer issues and gave
support in migration of accounts from manual kyc to ekyc and vice-versa.
- Designed meticulous Unit Tests and Functional Tests in eKYC and eKYB initiatives, elevating the overall application flow and ensuring exceptional code integrity. Added above 100+ test cases
in both initiatives.
- Tech Stack: Spring Boot, Mockito Framework.

positions.subtitle: Nasdaq
positions.description: - Worked on creating a ledger integrated UI application which facilitates asset trade and transfer between different parties using smart contracts. - Created smart contracts for features like asset creation, asset allocation, Free of Payments(FoP), Delivery vs Payments(DvP), Market Trade and also implemented the features on UI. - Tech Stack: ReactJS, DAML smart contracts, Spring Boot.
positions.title: Senior Software Developer

- Created smart contracts for features like asset creation, asset allocation, Free of Payments(FoP), Delivery vs Payments(DvP), Market Trade and also implemented the features on UI.
- Tech Stack: ReactJS, DAML smart contracts, Spring Boot.

experience.title: Dare in reality challenge

recommendations: Akshya Chettiar “It is very rare to find people who have the ability to learn quickly and start applying their skills to solve problems. One of them is Gazal. From backend to frontend to blockchain, she has worked on all of them diligently. I have worked with Gazal at Nasdaq. Calling her smart would be an understatement. She always emphasized the importance of strong teamwork. Anyone would be lucky to have her on their team.”

Pratik Gupta “Gazal is a very dedicated person when it comes to work. Having worked with her on many projects, I can say for sure that she is a great team player. She comes with unique, innovative ideas and plays a key role in development of the projects.”

volunteer_experience.info: I volunteered in the Coding competition held in our annual college fest Technovate 2018. My task was to arrange the resources required for the conduction of the event and to manage the participants crowd for registration on event day and also manage them during the competition.

projects.title: Open Source Contribution at @Karya.Inc
projects.description: -Improvised the application by adding new changes in schema design.-Database Migration - Refactored the existing code in a way to automatically perform db operations like alter table, create table and drop table based on changes in new incoming schema-spec (which contains definitions of all schemas and tables of the application).

projects.title: A CNN based approach to an integrated audio-video query answering system.
projects.description: Developed a app with database of text files in which user query is inputted along with the text document and the DL model embedded in the app produces one sentence answer as output.The 1d-CNN approach is used to reduce both training and testing time.Currently working on to improve the accuracy of the model and extracting answers for queries on videos

projects.title: Job Search WebApp for blue collared workers – WIT Microsoft Hackathon
projects.description: -Developed a WebApp to help blue collared workers find jobs in their nearby locations.- Included special features which focused mainly on providing employment to female workers.- Tech Stack: Elasticsearch, NodeJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

projects.title: Early Warning System on the prediction of ADR(Adverse drug Reaction)
projects.description: We developed a self-learning, early warning system for adverse drug reaction (ADR) and won prize money worth INR 3 lakhs.The web application can be used by healthcare professionals all over the world to get information regarding the probability of ADR associated with the drugs they would prescribe their patients.

projects.title: Live Trending Stocks Data Scraping.
projects.description: Scraping of live stocks data from https://www.investing.com/equities/trending-stocks using python, selenium, lxml,pandas,beautiful soup.Live data scraped from dynamic and multiple tables as well as bar graphs.

projects.title: Real Time Object Detection and segmentation Using Mask RCNN
projects.description: ML model trained on the COCO dataset and using the architecture of ResNet 101 to detect objects in photos or in real-time videos and which also does masking of the detected objects along with the labeling.

projects.title: Smart Fruit Warehouse System using IoT
projects.description: A smart fruit warehouse system designed for providing global access and monitoring control to users and to preserve the fruit stored for the desired number of days as per the user by automatically adjusting the parameters such as temperature humidity and light as per the requirement of that fruit.

projects.title: PARKIIIT- IOT based Smart Parking System
projects.description: A smart parking system based on IOT designed using Arduino and Sensors,a project intended towards energy conservation and to provide ease to the person in Parking vehicles
